column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Bosscat burger didn't come with fries? Thought that was a little weird but whatever. Great blend of meat
column2: very good taste and texture. Asked for rare and got it. Nice and juicy. Big fluffy bun but it stays together so you can take a bite. The fixings were very fresh and delicious. Awesome pickles. The sauce was just kind of there. I would have preferred a garlic aioli or something that made its presence known a bit more. Some parmigiana on top that seemed a little superfluous. Every burger does not need cheese and it tasted like a fine little cheese
column3: but just got lost in the mix on this burger.
